Subclass/Dual Class Master Raina:

You need to create/reset a subclass, huh?

A new class subclass starts at Level 40. "I'll add a new subclass (create new)".
 (Change dual classes and your level will be reset to level 40). "I'll eliminate a subclass and add another one. (reset)".
 Maintain your level while changing classes. "I'll change my subclass (need Subclass Change Certificate)".
